## Quaternion.setFromToRotation() method

Creates a rotation which rotates from fromDirection to toDirection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setFromToRotation(from: Vector3, to: Vector3, up?: Vector3): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the first Vector |
|  to | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the second Vector |
|  up | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the direction |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
